Oscar is a contractor and works in several places in and around the community.  His customers prefer his services because of his good work and attention to detail.

Oscar is asking for this loan to buy bricks, sand, cement, gravel, iron bars, and stones to build a wall behind his house.  He will build it himself in his spare time.  He is very happy to continue working with Prisma and this will be his fourth loan.

Oscar's dream is to continue improving his home.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Zenon

texts.es: El señor Zenón, tiene 47 años de edad, es de una familia humilde compuesta de cinco varones y tres mujeres, de escasos recursos económicos, por lo tanto cultiva superficies muy pequeñas. Vive en la comunidad de Matarani Chico del municipio de Mizque del departamento de Cochabamba. Trabaja en la agricultura  y la pecuaria desde hace 19 años produce y comercializa papa, frijol y maní para la alimentación de su familia el excedente los comercializa en el mismo lugar donde vive a los comerciantes de la misma población de Mizque. El señor Zenón es una persona muy respetada en su comunidad, por la dedicación a su trabajo y por ser el responsable de la educación y el bienestar de toda su familia. El señor Zenón, está solicitando el presente crédito para comprar más semillas de papa, frijol, maní, abono químico, orgánico y agroquímicos; y de esta forma tener más ingresos y mejorar las condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en: Zenón is 47.  He comes from a humble family made up of five men and three women.  They have scarce resources and therefore work with very small areas of land.  He lives in the community of Matarani Chico in the city of Mizque in the department of Cochabamba.  He has worked in agriculture and livestock for nineteen years.  He produces and sells potatoes, beans, and peanuts to feed his family.  He sells the extra in the same place where he lives to merchants from Mizque.  He is a very respected person in the community because of his dedication to his work and for being responsible for his family's education and well-being.  He is requesting this loan to buy more potato, bean, and peanut seeds; manure; and agricultural chemicals.  In this way, he will have more income to improve his and his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy potato, bean, and peanut seeds; manure; and agricultural chemicals.

loans.name: Guido Wilson

texts.es: EL SEÑOR GUIDO WILSON, es una persona de 24 años de edad, de estado civil soltero pero vive en concubinato, alcanzo a estudiar el bachillerato en humanidades, vive y trabaja actualmente en casa  de sus padres y cuenta con un dependiente económico a cargo el cual es su pequeño hijo. Las actividades económicas a las que se dedica el cliente en primera instancia es el servicio mecánico de mantenimiento y reparación de motocicletas en la población de Tiraque; asimismo aprovechando su misma mecánica en el mismo sitio realiza la venta en general de repuestos durante toda la gestión anual. El señor Guido Wilson manifiesta ser una persona trabajadora y responsable que quiere superarse y para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de operación para realizar la compra de más mercadería de repuestos de motocicleta para su tienda y de tal manera a futuro podrá generar mayores ganancias económicas que van a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Guido Wilson is 24 years old, single and is in a live in relationship.  He has a bachelor's degree in humanities and lives and works out of his parents' house.  He also has a son to support.  He works as a motorcycle mechanic in Tiraque and also sells spare parts throughout the year in the same town, taking advantage of his mechanical experience.  Guido says that he is a hardworking and responsible man who wants to succeed and has seen fit to request a loan to buy more motorcycle parts for his store.  This will allow him to generate more income and improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy spare parts.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.es:
Doña Delfina es una persona muy responsable, honesta y trabajadora, madre  soltera  vive  con   sus 4 hijos sur de Honduras. Su negocio es pulpería. 
Doña Delfina el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de refrescos, carne, maíz, leche, frijoles, manteca, jabón, azúcar, café, pan, agua, churros, etc. Con  el préstamo ella espera tener más mercadería que ofrecer para  poder cubrir los pedidos que en  esta temporada recibe de sus clientes. Y con los ingresos obtenidos espera mejorar un poco su situación económica  de la familia. 
Doña Delfina vive  en una  zona muy  comercial. En el futuro ella espera que su negocio sea   un mini súper y el más  grande de su comunidad, gracias a la inversión hecha en el mismo y sueña con ver a sus hijos  convertirlos en persona de bien y con mejores oportunidades  en la vida.



Choluteca, Honduras –  Noviembre del  2012
texts.en: Delfina is a very responible, honest, and hard-working person.  She is a single mother and lives with her four children in southern Honduras.  Her business is a grocery store.  Delfina needs this loan to buy soft drinks, meat, corn, milk, beans, butter, soap, sugar, coffee, bread, water, churros, etc.  With the loan, she will be able to have more merchandise to offer to be able to cover the costs of this season.  With the income she obtains, she hopes to improve her family's economic situation a little.  Delfina lives in a very commercial area.  In the future, she hopes that her business will be larger, the largest grocery store in the community, thanks to the investments she makes.  She dreams about seeing her children become worthy people with the best opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, meat, corn, milk, beans, butter, soap, sugar, coffee, bread, water, churros, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: EL CLIENTE EDGAR ES SOLTERO. DESDE HACE AÑOS, RADICA EN EL TROPICO DE COCHABAMBA, EN EL BARRIO VILLA VERDE DEL MUNICIPIO DE ENTRE RIOS. EL CLIENTE ES DE LA PROVINCIA CHAPARE DEL DEPARTAMENTO DE COCHABAMBA, UNO DE LOS LUGARES MAS POBRES DE BOLIVIA, VINO DE SU COMUNIDAD DE COLOMI COMO LA MAYORIA DE LAS PERSONAS BUSCANDO MAYOR OPORTUNIDAD DE VIDA, EN SU COMUNIDAD LA PRODUCCION BAJÓ DEBIDO A LOS CAMBIOS CLIMATOLOGICOS, DIFICIL DE CONTROLAR, CADA VEZ LA PRODUCCION BAJA Y ESCASEA, POR LO QUE DECIDIO IR AL TROPICO, PERO CON EL TRANSCURSO DEL TIEMPO, CON MUCHO TRABAJO Y ESFUERZO SE COMPRO SU LOTE AGRICOLA, EN LA QUE HOY EN DIA TRABAJA EN EL SECTOR AGRICOLA. EL CREDITO QUE ESTA SOLICITANDO ES PARA AMPLIACION DE YUCA DE  ESTA MANERA PODRA MEJORAR SU NIVEL DE VIDA TAMBIEN HA ESTADO SIEMPRE COLABORANDO EN SU SINDICATO MONTE SINAY QUE REALIZAN SUS ACTIVIDADES ECONOMICAS EN SU SINDICATO.
texts.en: Edgar is single and has lived in the Villa Verde neighborhood of Cochabamba for many years.  He is from the Chapare province, within the Cochabamba department.  It’s one of the poorest areas in Bolivia.  He came from his native community of Colomi, as most did, to look for a better opportunity.  Production decreased in his native community because of climate changes, and it continues to drop and become scarcer, so he decided to come to the tropical area.  Over time and with lots of hard work, he bought a plot of farmland and works as a farmer.  He is asking for this loan to expand his yucca production and be able to improve his life.  He has been cooperating with his group, “Monte Sinay,” whose members run their own businesses.

loans.use: Compra semilla de yuca para ampliar la producción

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: El Señor Luis de estado civil soltero de 31 años edad único hijo varón vive junto a su madre querida Florentina en una comunidad rural Pie de Gallo-Candelaria hacia el norte de Colomi. El joven Luis es dedicado a la actividad agrícola con ingresos económicos dentro del año de la venta de papa, haba, oca, papaliza de esta forma ellos se mantienen madre e hijo económicamente, cuenta con cabezas de ganado vacuno 5 de engorde, 1 lechera y 1 torillo, motivo que el joven necesita dinero para construir su propia casita ya que la vivienda actual es de su madre y se encuentra en  malas condiciones. El joven Luis necesita este crédito para poder construir su vivienda así para vivir más cómodos madre e hijo y siempre así trabajará para que su madre este en buen estado de salud.
texts.en: Luis is single, 31 years old, only male child and lives with his beloved mother Florentina in the rural community of Pie de Gallo-Candelaria north of Colomi.  He works in agriculture and gets his income for the year from the sale of potato, bean and root vegetables, this is how mother and son support each other financially, he has cattle head; 5 to fatten, 1 for dairy and 1 bull.  The reason this young man needs money is to build his own house because the current house belongs to his mother and is in bad condition.  Luis needs the loan to build a house and this way live more comfortably with his mother and he will continue to work so that his mother is in good health.

loans.use: to build a house.

loans.name: G.s.col.libertad Group

texts.es:
La Señora María  es una persona honesta y responsable vive con  su  esposo y sus 2  hijos  en un municipio al sur de Honduras. 
Doña María su negocio es la  fabricación de pan y necesita el préstamo  para la compra de harina, azúcar, mantaca, huevos y leña. Con el préstamo ella espera  el aumento de las ventas debido a que contara con más producto y en  esta temporada tener que ofrecer a los clientes que la visitan y así cubrir sus necesidades, así mismo desea  que  mejore  su situación  económica.
Doña María en unos años espera  que  su negocio este posicionado como una de las reposterías más reconocidas de su municipio  y poder seguir apoyando   sus hijos para que se conviertan en persona de bien y con principios.
Doña Deysi  su negocio es  venta de  ropa usada, desde hace 7 años en la misma comunidad. 
Doña Lesly  su negocio es  venta   cosméticos   desde hace 3 años. 



Choluteca, Honduras – Noviembre  2012
texts.en:
Maria is an honest and responsible person who lives with her husband and two children in a southern Honduras city.

Maria makes bread and needs a loan to buy flour, sugar, lard, eggs, and firewood.  She expects to increase her sales by increasing the amount of inventory she has to offer her customers.  At the same time she will be able to improve her economic situation.

Maria hopes that in a few years her business will be positioned as one of the best known businesses in the city and wants to be able to continue supporting her children so that they can become persons of means, with good principles.

Daysi sells used clothing and has for seven years in the same town.

Lesly sells cosmetics and has for three years.

loans.use: para la compra de harina, azúcar, mantaca, huevos y leña para su negocio.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es: La señor Pablo nació en la comunidad de Rodeo de la Provincia Tiraque del Departamento de Cochabamba, actualmente vecino y vive en su comunidad de Rodeo aproximadamente a 7 km sobre el camino a Colomi saliendo por Parra Rancho. El Sr. actualmente está viviendo en su comunidad junto a su esposa y sus seis hijos con su casa propia que es muy rustico las características de la casa donde esta viviendo es de adobe y techo de teja prácticamente rustico. La actividad a que se dedica el señor es la producción agrícola que produce los tubérculos y cereales en su comunidad, los trabajos agrícolas realizan toda su familia en algunos casos con ayuda de sus vecinos. El presente crédito está solicitando para reintegrar por compra de carrocería de su camioncito para realizar trabajos agrícolas. La comunidad del  cliente está ubicado al norte de la localidad de Tiraque
texts.en:
Pablo was born in the Rodeo community of Tiraque Province in the department of Cochabamba.  Currently he's living in his community of Rodeo, approximately 7 kilometers on the road to Colomi from Parra Rancho.  He lives with his wife and six children in their own home, which is very rustic: it's made of adobe with a rustic tile roof.

The work he does is agricultural, producing tubers and grains in his community.  The entire family works in agriculture, sometimes with the help of their neighbors.

He's requesting this loan to repay for bodywork on his little truck for doing agricultural work.

His community is located to the north of the town of Tiraque.

loans.use: to repay for bodywork on his truck

loans.name: Jorge Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Jorge es una persona trabajadora, de estado civil soltero, hace más de cuatro años incursiona en la actividad del trasporte público urbano, actividad que sustenta los gastos que este incurre; se pudo ver que el Sr. Jorge es una persona aspirante y con muchos sueños, pudiéndose evidenciar además de otra actividad que este desarrolla el de la venta de comida- restaurant, comentándonos así que hoy solicita el crédito para poder comprar un par de estantes para poner sus gaseosas y mejorar la presentación de su local ya que esto le ayudara a poder implementar el nuevo negocio que ahora tiene, que con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación y gusto la realiza, y de esa forma seguir trabajando paralelamente a su trabajo con el taxi; él nos indica que con el crédito otorgado le ayudara a mejorar sus ingresos a poder mejorar su negocio y a mejor su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jorge is a hard-working person.  He is single.  More than four years ago, he started working in public transportation, an activity that covered the expenses he incurred.  It could be seen that Jorge is a person with a lot of dreams, which is evident in the other work that he does of selling food in a restaurant.  He tells us that he is requesting a loan to be able to buy a pair of shelves to be able to display his soft drinks and to improve his location's presentation.  This will help him be able to implement his new business that he has.  He does this work with much effort, dedication, and pleasure.  He will continue to do this work parallel to his work driving a taxi.  He tells us that the loan offered to him will help him improve his income and to improve his business and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy shelves for his restaurant.

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es: El señor Paulino tiene 31 años de edad él vive en el Barrio Nueva Generación en alquiler de la provincia Carrasco, del Municipio de Chimoré, de la ciudad de Cochabamba. El Sr. Paulino se encuentra en concubinato con la señora Eulalia con la cual tiene  2 hijos,  Paulino trabaja como Agricultor y jornalero en el Sindicato Antofagasta. Paulino  vivía en Potosí hace como diez años atrás él tuvo que venir a Chimoré porque no tuvo los ingresos suficientes para poder mantener a su familia, el se volvió a levantar y junto a su esposa tomo un nuevo rumbo en su camino empezó de cero, ahora él tiene un lote urbano en los cuales tiene plantaciones de piña y la producción saca una vez al año, es una de las maneras de las que obtienen sus ingresos y de la misma manera él trabaja como jornalero realizando en el mismo sindicato.  El préstamo que solicita Paulino es para comprar  agroquímicos para poder inducir la piña y de esa manera podrá tener más ingresos y poder ayudar a sus hijos a terminar el colegio. Paulino sueña con un futuro mejor para sus hijos ya que el no pudo terminar el colegio ni hacer una carrera, pero él quiere que su hijos si puedan realizar una carrera y poder ayudar a las personas de la zona.
texts.en:
Paulino is 31 years old and lives in a rented house in Nueva Generación neighborhood, in the city of Cochabamba, in Chimoré municipality, in Carrasco province.  He lives together with his partner Eulalia and their two children.

Paulino works as both a farmer and a day laborer.  He is a member of the Antofagasta union.  Paulino used to live in Potosí but ten years ago he had to move to Chimoré because he was not making enough income to support his family.  He and his wife took a new direction in life, starting again from scratch.  Now Paulino has an urban plot of land where he grows pineapples which he harvests once a year.  This is one of the ways in which he makes income.  He also works as a day laborer, with the same union.

The loan that Paulino is requesting will be used to buy chemical fertilizers for his pineapple crops.  This will make him more income and he will be able to help his children complete their education.  Paulino dreams of a better future for his children as he himself was unable to finish school.  He would like his children to study at university and be able to help people in their area.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers for his pineapple crops

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es: El sr. Orlando tiene 29 años de edad él vive en la población de Chimoré, de la provincia carrasco, de la ciudad de Cochabamba, él se encuentra Soltero y su fuente de trabajo es en el Sindicato Alto San José a unos 15 km de la población de Chimoré,  Orlando se dedica al Trabajo como Jornalero y a la producción de yuca el no tuvo ingresos suficientes para poder comprarse un lote urbano. El Sr. Orlando se volvió a levantar  junto a sus padres tomo un nuevo rumbo en su camino empezó de cero.  El préstamo que solicita Orlando es para la compra de un lote urbano para luego hacer su construcción de vivienda  y de esa manera podrá tener una mejor vida ya que el no pudo terminar una carrera, pero él quiere que sus hijos si puedan realizar una carrera y poder ayudar a las personas de la zona.
texts.en:
Orlando, age 29, lives in Chimoré in the Carrasco province in the city of Cochabamba.  He is single, and his source of income is from Sindicato Alto San José, which is 15 kilometers from Chimoré.

He used to work as a day worker with yucca production, but he did not have sufficient income to be able to buy a plot of urban land.  Orlando and his parents pulled themselves up again and started anew from zero.

The loan that Orlando is requesting is to buy an urban plot of land.  He will then build his house there.  This way he will be able to have a better life.  He was not able to finish studying for a career.  However, he wants his children to be able to have a career and to be able to help the people in the area.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land.

loans.name: Mery

texts.es: La señora  Mery tiene 30 años de edad, vive en la provincia de Quillacollo Municipio de Vinto del departamento de Cochabamba, tiene 1 hijo dependiente de ella, separada del padre de su hijo hace 12 años dado que la abandono y no se sabe nada del todo ese tiempo, perseverante con sus metas la cliente se dedica a la producción de leche cruda, en la cual ya tiene una experiencia de 5 años, y así saco adelante a su hijo el cual se encuentra en edad escolar y es un alumno muy bueno destacado por su gran capacidad de aprendizaje, toda la producción de leche es entregada a la  PIL al módulo lechero AINPA - CHINCHILLA, el motivo del presente crédito es para poder comprar  cascara de soya, para poder alimentar a su ganado lechero y obtener más producción de leche, y así seguir sacando adelante a su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
Mery, age 30, lives in the Quillacollo province, Vinto municipality, Cochabamba department.  She has one child who is dependent upon her.  She has been separated from her child’s father for 12 years because he abandoned her.  For all of this time, nothing is known about him.

She perseveres with her goals, and she devotes herself to the production of raw milk.  She has five years of experience, and that is how she got her school age child ahead.  He is a very remarkable student because of his great capacity for learning.

All of her milk production is delivered to PIL’s [industrial milk production plant ] AINPA – CHINCHILLA dairy module.

The reason for this loan is to be able to buy soybean hulls in order to be able to feed her dairy cows.  She will do this to get more milk production, and this way she will continue getting her young child ahead.

loans.use: to buy soybean hulls to feed her dairy cows.

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es: La cliente la señora  Mary Luz tiene 32 años de edad,   no tiene hijos dependiente, pero está a cargo de sus hermanos dado que ella es la única familia que tienen, vive en la provincia Colcapirhua de Cochabamba en la zona norte, perseverante con sus metas, a pesar de que sus padres murieron hace ya 12 años, ella estudio la carrera de Bioquímica de la cual es egresada con muy buenas calificaciones, tiene 2 hermanos los cuales están aún en edad escolar y son muy buenos alumnos, se dedica a la producción de leche cruda la cual es entregada en su totalidad a la fábrica de leche PIL, el motivo del presente crédito es para poder comprar cascara de soya, para así poder alimentar a sus vacas las cuales representan un ingreso para poder ayudar a sus hermanos a salir adelante y que ellos también puedan estudiar una carrera en la universidad.
texts.en:
The client, Mary Luz, 32, has no dependent children but she's responsible for her siblings because she's the only family they have.  She lives in the province of Colcapirhua in Cochabamba, in the northern area.  Persistent in her goals, she studied biochemistry and graduated with very good grades in spite of the fact that her parents died 12 years ago.  She has two siblings who are still in school and are very good students.

She makes a living producing raw milk, all of which she sells to the PIL milk factory.

The reason for the current loan is to be able to buy soybean husk to feed her cows, which represent an income to be able to help her siblings get ahead and also study in the university.

loans.use: to buy soybean husk to feed her cows

loans.name: Maria Dula

texts.es:
La Señora María de 36 años de edad es divorciada y tiene 3 hijos ella vive en la Maica central una zona de la ciudad de Cochabamba, se dedica a la producción de leche y al mismo tiempo a la cría de cerdos la señora María es muy dedicada a su trabajo.
La Señora María se dedica a la educación de sus hijos puesto que cuando se divorcio quedo que el esposo le pasaría pensiones para la educación de los niños pero hasta el momento no la apoya, ya que uno de los hijos se fue a vivir con su padre al Chapare. Ella trabaja desde muy temprano para la entrega de la leche para que no les falte nada a sus hijos que están en la escuela y darles lo mejor que ella pueda brindarles, La señora María  trabajó desde muy joven en la producción de leche, sin parar aun estando embarazada. El préstamo que solicita es para compra de forraje, esto incrementara sus ingresos porque podrá entregar más litros de leche ya que tendrá una buena produccion. Ella sueña con un mejor futuro para sus hijos y les pide que jamás cometan el error que cometió de casarse joven sin antes haber acabado sus estudios y sin tener una profesión, quiere que su hija pueda realizar una carrera y tener una vida mejor que la que tuvo ella.
texts.en:
María, 36, is divorced and has three children.  She lives in the Maica Central area of Cochabamba.  She makes a living producing milk and raising pigs.  María's very dedicated to her job.

María's dedicated to her children's education because when she divorced it was decided that her husband would give her an allowance for the children's education.  He hasn't supported her yet, though, because one of the children went to live with him in El Chapare.  

She works from early in the morning to deliver the milk so she can give her children, who are in school, the best she can and so they don't lack anything.  María worked producing milk from a very young age without stopping, even when she was pregnant.

The loan she's requesting is to buy fodder.  This will increase her income because she will have better production and be able to produce more liters of milk.

She dreams of a better future for her children and asks that they never make the same error she did of getting married young without having finished school and without a profession.  She wants her daughter to be able to have a career and a better life than she herself had.

loans.use: to buy fodder

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es: El Sr. Cesar tiene 41 años de edad y es de estado civil soltero, no pudo estudiar por problemas económicos y tuvo que trabajar de chofer, hace varios años ya  que se dedica a la actividad de transporte de pasajeros públicos de taxi, realiza su actividad económica en la zona urbana de la ciudad de Tarija. Nos cuenta que la actividad de servicios de transporte público urbano (taxi) es su mayor y único ingreso con el que cuenta del cual depende para sostenerse económicamente; es por tal motivo que necesita un préstamo para la reparación de su vehículo ya que se le embromo la parte eléctrica y quiere rehabilitarlo poniéndolo de nuevo en servicio ya que es su herramienta de trabajo y necesita su vehículo para poder subsistir; de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y continuar apoyando a sus familiares y poder ahorrar para mejorar su vivienda donde actualmente vive.
texts.en: Mr. Cesar is 41 years old and single. He could not study for a professional career due to economic problems, and instead had to take a job as a driver. For a number of years, he has been dedicated to transporting the public in a taxi. He works in the urban area of the city of Tarija. Cesar tells us that his taxi service is his largest source of income, and the only one he can depend on to support himself economically. Because of this, he needs a loan to repair his vehicle, which has a broken electrical part that needs to be replaced. The vehicle is his main tool for work, and Cesar needs it to be able to support himself. In this way, he will be able to improve his quality of life, continue supporting his relatives, and be able to save money to improve his home.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es: Hugo, tiene 23 años de edad es bachiller, soltero sin hijos, tiene sueños de seguir estudiando pero por falta de economía no puede seguir estudiando, actualmente vive en la casa de sus padres, quienes son personas mayores ya de tercera edad no pueden costearle los estudios a su hijo pero el muchacho es trabajador lo comentan sus amigos y vecinos por ahora se dedica a trabajar en una parte del lote agrícola que le otorgaron sus padres tiene cultivos de maíz y yuca pero no le es suficiente para que ahorre y termine sus estudios a nivel profesional por tal motivo quiere mejorar sus ingresos con plantaciones de maracuyá, el joven Hugo, necesita  mucha ayuda económica para mejorar sus ingresos y así pueda ser un gran profesional, él quiere ser abogado para defender a personas que necesiten de su ayuda.
texts.en:
Hugo, age 23, has a bachelor's degree, is single, and does not have children.  He has dreams about continuing his education, but for lack of funds he is not able to continue studying.  He is currently living in his parents’ house.  They are elderly, and they are not able to pay for their son’s education.  

However, his friends and neighbors say that he is hard-working.  He presently works on an agricultural plot of land that his parents gave him.  He grows corn and yucca.  However, this does not give him enough to save and finish his education at a professional level.

That is the reason he wants to improve his income by planting passion fruit.  Hugo needs a lot of financial help in order to improve his income.  This way he will be able to be a great professional.  He wants to be a lawyer in order to defend people who needs his help.

loans.use: to buy supplies to plant passion fruit.

loans.name: Juntos Podemos Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “JUNTOS PODEMOS”; Este banco se encuentra ubicado en  la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ulda ella es separada, tiene 33 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de artesania,la socia elabora muñecas ,mochilas, matas típicas entre otros, la socia lleva años  en este negoció el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia cuenta con una tienda donde vende toda su mercadería por el centro de la ciudad, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia  saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales como cuero y lana de alpaca .

Los otros socios  se dedican a la venta de salchipapas, venta de ropa, carpintería metálica, carpinteria, venta de artesania, docente.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: The members belong to the "JUNTOS PODEMOS"  ("TOGETHER WE CAN") communal bank which is situated in Cusco province, in Cusco region.  Ulda is 33 years old, separated and the mother of 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business making and selling handicrafts:  dolls, backpacks and traditional blankets, among other things.  Ulda has been in this business for some years now and is successful thanks to the effort which she puts into it on a daily basis.  She sells all her merchandise from her shop in the city centre and her responsible and determined approach enables her to support her family.  She is applying for the loan to buy materials such as leather and alpaca wool.  The other members of the group work in French fries and hotdog sales, clothing sales, metalwork, carpentry, handicrafts sales and teaching.  Ulda is grateful to those who are part of her dream in this way and is committed to make her repayments within the agreed period.

loans.use: to buy materials such as leather and alpaca wool

loans.name: Ercilia De Jesús

texts.es: “En la vida existen situaciones en la que sientes que no se puede dar un paso más, que la batalla está perdida y que cualquier intento es infructuoso”. Con estas palabras doña Ercilia nos cuenta como ha sido su vida después de la separación con su esposo y de todas las cosas que tuvo que hacer para sacar adelante a sus dos hijos. Sin estudio y con pocas posibilidades de emplearse tomó la determinación de montar un puesto de comidas rápidas para ofrecerle a su familia una vida digna. Su mayor sueño es poder montar un local de comidas rápidas para evitar los contratiempos que padece con su carro móvil, como lo son las inclemencias del clima que le ha generado grandes pérdidas. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que comprará insumos para la preparación de las comidas en este fin de año que es donde más se incrementan las ventas.
texts.en: “There are moments in life when you feel you can go any further, that the battle is lost and that whatever attempts is fruitless”. Ercilia is using these words to describes to what her life has been after she separated from her husband and the things she has had to do to provide for her two children. With no schooling and with very few chances to find a job, she decided to set up a fast food stall in order to grant a dignified life to her family. Her biggest dream is to succeed in opening a fast food locale to avoid all the accidents she faces working with her mobile food-cart, such as the inclemency of the weather which has already cost her a lot of money. She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients to prepare food to sell during the end of the year season, as this is the time of the year when she sells the most.

loans.use: to purchase bread, meat and sodas to make fast food

loans.name: Juan Gabriel

texts.es: El Joven Juan desde muy temprana edad comenzó a trabajar  en la mecánica como ayudante, para luego convertirse en su principal ingreso de sustento diario, por tal motivo decidió mejorar sus conocimientos en mecánica en general y comenzó a estudiar en la escuela de mecánica SIMON BOLIVAR, durante sus años de estudio el solventaba sus estudios con su trabajo, actualmente cursa su último semestre de estudio, la solicitud del préstamo es para comprarse herramientas de mecánica que le será de utilidad para montar su propio taller, en casa de su madre que le está brindando todo el espacio de adelante para que él pueda iniciar con su negocio, como respaldo de su buen trabajo la dirección de la línea de transporte de micros N° 14 le ha ofrecido que se vaya con ellos como su mecánico oficial, con este préstamo el  Sr. Juan podrá  hacer realidad su sueño de tener su propio taller y generar más ingresos para ayudar en su casa.
texts.en:
Juan began working as a mechanic's assistant at an early age, and this work later became his main income source. He decided to increase his knowledge and is studying mechanics at the Simon Bolivar institute. He has paid his tuition and fees by working and is now in his final semester.

He is applying for a loan to buy tools to open his own repair shop in his mother's house. She is offering him space so that he can start his business. Management of the micro bus line N° 14 has offered him the position of official mechanic in light of his excellent work. With this loan, Juan will be able to realize his dream of having his own workshop and generating more income for his household.

loans.use: to buy mechanic's tools.

loans.name: Demetrio

texts.es: El  señor Demetrio  tiene 35 años de edad  no estudió por la crisis económica que afectó a su familia, vive en concubinato con salome de 31 años de edad  tienen cuatro hijos necesita ayuda para hacer estudiar a sus niños. El Sr. Demetrio menciona que por falta de recursos económicos puede que sus hijos no estudien, desde muy joven se dedica a trabajar como agricultor, albañil y  moto taxista, para tener un futuro mejor y próspero, el cliente actualmente trabaja como moto taxista en el sindicato CARRASCO,  en la localidad de Ivirgarzama Municipio de Puerto Villarroel,  el servicio que brinda es rentable por la alta demanda de personas que solicitan este servicio por la facilidad , rapidez, puntualidad,  responsabilidad y eficiencia. El Sr. Demetrio también trabaja en la agricultura en sus días de descanso para mejorar su ingreso.El destino será para la compra de una nueva motocicleta, debido a que lo que tiene actualmente ya cumplió su ciclo de trabajo y  mejorar el servicio a sus clientes lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos consecuentemente sus calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Demetrio, 35, did not study because of the financial crisis that affected his family.  He lives in a common-law marriage with Salomé, 31.  They have four children.  He needs help so his children can study.  Demetrio says it's possible his children won't be able to study because of his lack of resources.  Since he was very young he has worked as a farmer, a bricklayer, and a motorcycle taxi driver, to have a better and prosperous future.

He currently works as a motorcycle taxi driver for the Carrasco labor union in the community of Ivirgarzama, town of Puerto Villarroel.  The service he offers is profitable because of the high demand from people who request it because of ease, speed, punctuality, responsibility, and efficiency.  To improve his income Demetrio also works in agriculture on his days off.

The loan will be to buy a new motorcycle because the one he currently has no longer works, and to improve his customer service.  This will allow him to improve his income and, consequently, his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El Sr. Mario trabaja desde hace mas de 12 años en el área de taller de radiarores negocio que a ayudado  a sacar adelante a su familia, fue con este servicio que ha comprado su casa  y la esta levantando de a poco , ambos trabajan su esposa vende comida en la puerta de su taller para aportar con los ingresos de la familia , requiere un préstamo para la compra de insumos para taller de radiadores y material de soldar,  ya que es un elemento necesario para su negocio, se estima que los ingresos que le generen ayudara  a mejorar sus servicios ,  el cliente tiene el compromiso de trabajo  se puede ver  la honestidad del señor Mario y su esposa Elizabeth con la ayuda de su hijo que es a quien le enseña el mismo oficio para mas adelante el pueda afrontar la vida.
texts.en:
For more than 12 years, Mario has run a radiator repair shop that has supported his family and helped him buy and renovate a house. He and his wife work; she sells food from the shop's door to bring in income for the family. 

He needs a loan to buy supplies for his radiator repair shop and soldering material, which is essential to his service. He expects that the income generated will help him improve his service, which he guarantees to his customers. One can see Mario and his wife Elizabeth's honesty as they teach their son the same profession so that he can later make his way in life.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his radiator repair shop and soldering material.

loans.name: Savath's Group

texts.en:
Savath, 34 years old, is a villager residing in a rural area of Battambang province’s Ek Phnom district in Cambodia. She is married and has three dependent kids, all of whom are school-aged children. To support the family, Savath works as a rice farmer while her husband works as a fisherman to complement the income. This industrious couple can earn approximately 27,000 KHR per day and saves around 9,000 KHR after canceling out the daily expenses. 

This will be Savath’s eighth time requesting loan via VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Savath stated that via the help that she received in the form of the previous loans she was able to improve her family’s lifestyle and sufficiently meet the family’s needs. Now she is leading a loan group of three female members to apply for a new loan with VisionFund in the amount of 1,200,000 KHR each. As a group representative, Savath will use her loan portion to support her rice-growing business by purchasing fertilizer and her husband’s business, fish-catching business, by purchasing fishing materials such as fish traps and cast nets. 

This hard-working mother (Savath) has a dream of being able to run a new business, which is selling grocery items, in the hope of generating even more income to the family. This new requested loan portion will have a positive effect on her family’s living condition and family’s income. She will also be able to utilize the anticipated income to further her beloved kids’ education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Hatun Soncco Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “HATUN SONCCO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             

La socia es la Sra. Maruja ella es casada y tiene 50  años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de crianza de animales, la socia vende cuyes y gallinas, la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en el mercado y también envía a lugares como Puerto Maldonado, la socia en sus tiempos libres le gusta tejer chompas para sus hijos, la socia se dedica a este negocio 7 años en este negocio, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar gallinas y cuyes y alimentos para los animales.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de restaurant, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de cerveza y negocio de servicio de taxi.

 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank Hatun Soncco. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member, Maruja, is marred and is 50 years old with 3 children. She works in her own business raising animals, selling guinea pigs and chickens. She fattens them and later sells them in the market and also delivers them to places such as Puerto Maldonado. In her free time she likes to knit sweaters for her children. She has been in this business for 7 years. Her dream is to have her own facility where she can sell animals. She is asking for a loan in order to buy chickens, guinea pigs, and animal feed.

The other members have the following businesses: restaurants, grocery stores, selling beer, and taxi services. 

The borrower offers thanks to those who are a part of this dream through this means and she promises to make her payments according to the established plan.

loans.use: to buy chickens, guinea pigs, and animal feed.

loans.name: Virgen De Guadalupe- Cusco Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN DE GUADALUPE-CUSCO”; Este banco se ubicado en  la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. María ella es conviviente, tiene 37 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de carteras y bolsas de cuero, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia elabora estos productos para luego venderlo a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales como cuero para su negocio.

Los otros socios  se dedican a la venta de ponchos de agua, venta de artefactos, venta de cueros, artesania, venta de autos.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to Virgen de Guadalupe-Cusco Communal Bank, located in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member, María, 37, lives with her partner and has four children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling leather wallets and bags.  She has been in this business for years and it's going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She makes these products to sell to her customers who request them.  She's a responsible and persevering person, this being the way she gets her family ahead.

She's requesting the loan to buy materials such as leather for her business.

The other members work making rain ponchos, selling crafts, selling leather, arts and crafts, and selling cars.

She's grateful to those who are part of her dream through this loan and she's committed to making her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy materials such as leather

loans.name: Happy Ayllu Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “HAPPY AYLLU”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Wanchaq, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             

La socia es la Sra. Alejandrina ella es casada y tiene 50 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de manteles y edredones, la socia tiene un puesto en un centro comercial, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 30 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de edredones y manteles. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar manteles y edredones al por mayor.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de restaurant, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de crianza de animales y negocio de venta de vinos.

 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “HAPPY AYLLU” community bank. This bank is located in the district of Wanchaq, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             

Señora Alejandrina is a member. She is married, 50 years old, and has three children. She works in her business selling tablecloths and quilts, and has a stall in a shopping mall. The member works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm. She has been in this business for 30 years and is doing very well.

Alejandrina's dream is to expand her tablecloth and quilt business. She is requesting the loan to buy wholesale tablecloths and quilts.

The other members make a living with a restaurant, a grocery store, a business selling animals, and a business selling wine. 

The member is grateful to those who are part of her dream and is committed to making her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy wholesale tablecloths and quilts.

loans.name: Saren's Group

texts.en:
Saren, 49 years of age, resides in a rural village in the Sangke district of Cambodia’s Battambang province. She is married and has four children, one (daughter) of whom is under her responsibility and currently in school. Saren has a business buying and selling rice. She is able to earn around 85,000 KHR daily through her business, of which she saves approximately 14,000 KHR for future needs after paying her daily expenses.

Saren is the leader of a loan group of two female members, both first-time borrowers with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). They are taking out a loan of 1,000,000 KHR each. Saren will use her portion of the loan to buy more rice to sell. After receiving the requested loan, Saren believes that she can gain more profit for the family and use the anticipated profit to further advance her school-aged daughter's education and to improve the family’s livelihood.

loans.use: to buy more rice to sell

loans.name: Thoem's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a village of Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Thoem is aged 32 years and widowed, with one daughter who is still in school. For more than ten years, she has struggled to feed her children by farming rice on 1.5 hectare of farmland as the primary source of the family’s income.  She can earn about 10,000KHR per day and manage to save about 3,000KHR each day for future needs.
 
Thoem has been with VisionFund for three cycles and completely paid back the past loans while the other member has been with VisionFund for one cycle. Thoem successfully paid back the past loans which have helped her to relieve her family’s burden. Now she is leading her group of two to request a loan of 500,000KHR each. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland. This loan will enable her to extend her farmland to increase her rice farming production to make more rice to improve her family’s lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland

loans.name: Sophon's Group

texts.en:
Sophon, 29, lives in Kampong Cham province’s Tbaung Khmum district in Cambodia. She is married and blessed with a child who is still under her responsibility and too young for schooling. Sophon and her husband work as rice farmers in order to support the family. To earn additional income, Sophon works in a garment factory and her husband is a construction worker. This hard-working couple generates a daily income of approximately 18,000 KHR, of which they save about 6,000 KHR after offsetting the daily cost of living.

Sophon is the leader of a two-member group, both first-time borrowers with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). They are applying for a loan of 400,000 KHR each. Sophon will use her portion of the loan to rent a rice harvesting machine to support her rice farming business by helping her to harvest rice on time.

loans.use: to rent a rice harvesting machine

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Ngoun's Group

texts.en:
Ngoun, 62, lives with her husband and four children in a village of Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Cambodia. To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice on five-hectare of farmland for almost ten years and her husband supplements family’s income by catching fishes in local area. Together, they can earn about 20,000 KHR per day but they can manage to save about 12,000KHR each day after off-setting daily expenses. 

Ngoun has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for four loan cycles and completely paid back the loans while the other member has been for three loan cycles. With the loans from VisionFund, Ngoun has managed to improve her livelihood. She is now leading her group of two to request another loan of 1,400,000KHR each. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to spend on labor costs in harvesting rice. With this loan, Ngoun hopes to increase her family’s income so as to make a better living.

loans.use: To spend on the labor costs of harvesting rice

loans.name: Kabaka 2 Group

texts.en: Simplex is a 30-year-old married man with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been a food vendor for six years and with the proceeds, he has been able to buy land for farming. The good father that he is, he desires to educate his children up to the University level although he did not have a chance to go to school due to his parents' financial constraints. Simplex hopes to have a stable and permanent business despite the challenges of bad weather, which reduces the food supply, and inadequate capital. Simplex is requesting a loan to buy bananas, cassava and oranges to sell.

loans.use: to buy bananas, cassava and oranges to sell.

loans.name: Savoern

texts.en:
Savoern, 57, lives in a rural area in Kampong Cham province’s Ou Reang Ov district. She has two children who work at a garment factory to better support the family. Savoern has been a rice farmer for 28 years, and the current business earns her about 19,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. The main challenge for her family’s business is the lack of water. 

This is Savoern's first microloan with VisionFund. She is applying for a loan of 4,000,000 KHR to pay for labor costs to harvest the rice paddy. Savoern will use a portion of the loan to increase her savings for constructing a proper house for her family. She hopes that this loan will enable her to harvest more rice to improve her family’s living standard.

loans.use: To pay for labor costs to harvest the rice paddy

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Rourng

texts.en:
Rourng lives in a rural village of the Srey Snom district of Siem Reap province, Cambodia. She is 50 years old and married.  She has three children, one of whom is still in school in the local area, while the others help their family’s business. To support her family, she has been farming rice on 5 hectare area of farmland. Having been in this business for 10 years, she is able to earn about 10,000KHR per day and manage to save about 5,000KHR each day after daily expenses. 

This is the first microloan for Rourng with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is requesting a loan of 2,000,000KHR. She wants to use this loan to pay for labor fees in harvesting rice. She hopes to get a high crop yield from her paddy business so as to make her living conditions better and keep her child in school.

loans.use: To pay for labor fees in harvesting rice

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de bar y picanteria,la socia prepara diferentes platos tipicos como cuy al horno,pollo al horno y sopas,la socia tambien vende gaseosas y cervezas,la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de picanteria y bar.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos como carne,pollo y verduras para la picanteria.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yolanda continues to work at her bar/restaurant business.   She prepares different traditional meals such as roasted guinea pig, roasted chicken, and soups.  She also sells beer and sodas.   She works from 9 AM until 6 PM. She has worked at this business for 8 years and it is going very well for her.

Her dream is to expand her restaurant/bar business.  She requests a loan to buy products such as: meat, chicken, and vegetables for her restaurant.  

Yolanda is pleased to be getting this loan, and she promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy products such as: meat, chicken, and vegetables for her restaurant.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant,la socia prepara dsayunos,almuerzos y cenas,la socia prepara platos como pollo al horno,tallarines y sopas entre otros platos,la socia ya tiene 9 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar verduras,pollo y carne para cocinar para su restaurant.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Ana continues to run her restaurant of nine years, where she prepares dishes such as roast chicken, noodles, and soups. The business is prospering, and she dreams of growing it. She is applying for a loan to buy vegetables, chicken, and meat to prepare food at her restaurant. She is pleased to have the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, chicken, and meat to prepare food at her restaurant.

loans.name: Jorge Antonio

texts.es: El Señor Jorge, es una persona responsable cuenta con una pequeña pensión  en Ivirgarzama, es soltero y no tiene hijos, pero cuenta con dos hermanos a los cuales el ayuda y apoya en su educación. El Sr. Jorge se fue de Yapacani a Ivirgarzama  hace como 3 años con su familia, empezó como albañil, jornalero, etc., poco a poco el empezó ahorrar dinero para poder tener su propio negocio, hoy en día cuenta con una pensión que es uno de los mas concurridos en la localidad. El Sr. Jorge, necesita un préstamo para la ampliación de su pequeña pensión y así poder ofrecer un mejor servicio a la gente del lugar y por defecto mejorar sus ingresos  su calidad de vida de él y sus hermanos.
texts.en:
Jorge is responsible and has a small restaurant in Ivirgarzama. He is single and has no children, but he has two brothers that he helps with their education expenses. He moved from Yapacani to Ivirgarzama three years ago with his family and started working as a bricklayer and day laborer. Slowly, he saved money to start his own business. 

Today he has a restaurant in one of the busiest sections of town. Jorge needs a loan to expand his small restaurant and offer better service to the customers. This will increase his income and improve his life and the lives of his brothers.

loans.use: to expand his restaurant.

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.es: La Sra. Nicolasa junto a su familia vive en su propio domicilio, es una persona de 52 años de edad, de estado civil casada, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, cuenta con tres dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus hijos. La actividad económica a la que se dedica junto a su esposo es la producción agrícola; producen papa, haba y arveja  en sus propios terrenos de los cuales una parte cuenta con riego y otras son temporales que se hallan situados en la comunidad de Pucara Chico distante a unos 6 Km. al este del municipio de Tiraque. Y finalmente la señora Nicolasa junto a su esposo manifiestan ser personas trabajadores y responsables que quieren superarse e incrementar su producción agrícola y para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de reposición por la compra de terreno agrícola y compra de material para construcción, de tal forma obtener mayores ingresos económicos que van a mejorar la calidad de vida de sus dependientes.
texts.en:
Nicolasa lives with her family in their own home. She is 52 years old, married, and finished primary school. Her three dependent children are in her care.

Her economic activity that she works in together with her husband is farming. They grow potatoes, beans and peas on their own irrigated plots, and other interim land located in the community of Pucara Chico, some 6 kilometers from the town of Tiraque.

In conclusion, Nicolasa and her husband show themselves to be hardworking and responsible people who want to get ahead and increase their agricultural production and to do this they need to ask for supplemental funds for the purchase of agricultural land and to buy construction supplies, so that they can obtain better financial income in order to improve the quality of life for their dependents.

loans.use: to buy farmland and construction materials.

loans.name: Ines

texts.es:
La socia Ines se dedica al negocio de venta de comida,ella vende en forma ambulatoria,la socia prepara comidas como pollo al horno,estofado de pollo y sopas,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz,pollo,carne y verduras.

La socia esta feliz con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Ines works as a street trader, preparing and selling meals such as roast chicken, chicken stew and soups.  She has been in this business for 7 years and does very well.  Her dream is to own a restaurant. She is seeking the loan to buy cooking products such as rice, chicken, meat and vegetables.  She would be delighted to be granted a loan and is committed to make her repayments.

loans.use: to buy cooking products such as  rice, chicken, meat and vegetables

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: La señora Lourdes tiene 42 años, vive con su  esposo, tienen 4 hijos que dependen de ellos. Dos de sus hijos están estudiando en la Universidad, la tercera esta  en  Colegio  y el menor aun es un bebe. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de abarrotes en una tienda pequeña y el esposo trabaja en una granja de porcinos donde es el encargado de área de  maternidades. El diario vivir de la señora Lourdes es muy sacrificado ya que ella también tiene que atender a sus hijos y las labores del hogar.   Los ingresos que tienen solo alcanza para sustento familiar, por eso no tienen una vivienda en condiciones adecuada para una vida mejor de la familia,  por eso ella necesita un préstamo para  invertir en la construcción de vivienda y así poder mejorar la vivienda para su familia.
texts.en: Lourdes, who is 42, lives with her husband and their 4 dependent children.  Two of the children are studying at university, a third is at high school and the youngest is still a baby.  Lourdes buys and sells groceries in a small shop and her husband works at a pig farm where he is in charge of farrowing.  Lourdes' daily life is very demanding because she also has to look after her children and do the housework.  The couple's income is only enough to cover their subsistence and so they do not have adequate housing, which would improve the lives of all the members of the family.  She needs the loan to pay for construction work which will enable her to improve her family's home.

loans.use: to have construction work done on her home

loans.name: Delia Fortunata

texts.es:
La socia Delia Fortunata se dedica al negocio de venta de ropas para bebes,la socia vende pantalones,chompas entre otras ropas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 6 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,la socia trabaja en forma independiente,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la ropa para los bebes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar chompas,pantalones y polos al por mayor para bebes.

La socia esta contenta con el credito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Delia Fortunata, makes a living selling baby clothing.  She sells pants, sweaters, and other clothing, working from 8 a.m. until 6 p.m.  She already has been in this business for six years and it's going very well for her.  She works on her own.  Her dream is to have a store where she can sell baby clothes.

She's requesting the loan to buy wholesale sweaters, pants, and polo shirts for babies.

She's happy about the loan and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, pants, and polo shirts for babies

loans.name: Carlos Vladimir

texts.es: El señor Carlos es un hombre que sufrió la pérdida de un ser querido la cual lo  deprimió mucho por eso decayó hasta el punto de casi morirse,  pero ahora el desea volver a levantarse con las actividades que realizaba anteriormente. El Sr. Carlos es oriental y emigro al altiplano para buscar mejores oportunidades de vida económicas  y sentimentales porque el oriente le trae malos recuerdos, una vez que llego a la localidad de Patacamaya  por ser bueno, sincero y confiable  llego a congeniar con las personas de la comunidad y decidió abrir una botica donde vende medicamentos y realiza consultas gratis como obras sociales para reponerse de la perdida sentimental que atravesó en su lugar de origen.  El Señor Carlos necesita comprar medicamentos para la botica, y así podrá ayudar a la gente de la localidad de Patacamaya porque con sus conocimiento y experiencia sana a mucha gente de escasos recursos que  acuden a él para solucionar problemas de salud. Él se siente mejor en Patacamaya por el cambio de ambiente y la labor social que empezó a desempeñar con niños, adolescentes , adultos y ancianitos del lugar.
texts.en:
Carlos is a man who suffered the loss of a loved one.  This depressed him a lot, to the point that he almost died.  However, now he wants to get back on his feet again with the work he was doing previously.

Carlos is from the Oriente [region of Bolivia] and he emigrated to the Altiplano [high plains] in search of better opportunities for life, finances, and relationships because the Oriente brings him bad memories.  Once he arrived to the town of Patacamaya, he managed to get along well with the community members because he's good, sincere, and trustworthy.  He decided to open a pharmacy to sell medicine, and he does free consultations as a community service to recover from the sentimental loss he went through in his hometown.

Carlos needs to buy medicine for the pharmacy.  This way he'll be able to help people in the town of Patacamaya because with his knowledge and experience, he heals a lot of low-income people who go to him to resolve their health problems.

He feels better in Patacamaya because of the change of environment and the social work he began to carry out with children, teenagers, adults, and senior citizens in the area.

loans.use: to buy medicine

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es:
La socia Maruja se dedica al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche y aceite,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,en sus timpos libres a la socia le gusta preparar tortas,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y aceite.

La socia esta contenta con el credito otrogado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Maruja, makes a living with a grocery store business.  She sells staple items such as rice, sugar, milk, and oil.  She already has worked in this business for five years and it's going very well for her.  In her free time she likes to make cakes.  Her dream is to expand her grocery store.

She's requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and oil. 

She's happy about the loan granted and committed to making her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and oil

loans.name: Abrahan

texts.es: El Sr. Abrahan es una persona tranquila y trabajadora, cursó hasta la primaria, no pudo concluir el bachillerato por problemas económicos, viéndose en la necesidad de buscar trabajo y por tanto dejar de lado los estudios; de estado civil soltero, pero cuenta con un hijo a quien le brinda su apoyo moral y económico. El Sr. Abrahán hoy solicita el crédito con el fin de poder reparar el vehículo con el cual trabaja en el rubro del transporte público y así no dejar de percibir el único ingreso con el cual actualmente cuenta y de esa forma sustentar a su hijo y poder cubrir los gastos de la educación que le implica. Al Sr. Abrahan  le favorecerá este crédito mucho ya que su mayor anhelo es el de incursionar en otra actividad, es esta la razón que le motiva a poder seguir adelante y poder ahorrar para concretar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Abrahán is a peaceful and hardworking person.  He finished his elementary education but wasn't able to finish his secondary degree; because of economic problems, he had to look for work and leave his studies behind.  He's single but has a child, whom he supports morally and financially.

Abrahán is currently requesting a loan to be able to repair the vehicle he uses in the public transportation field.  This way he won't lose his only current income, and he'll support his child and cover his educational expenses.

This loan will benefit Abrahán because his biggest desire is to get started on a new job, which motivates him to be able to get ahead and save money to make his dreams come true.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle

loans.name: Katherine Marilia

texts.es:
La socia Katherine Marilia se dedica al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia tambien trabaaja en un discoteca y tambien la socia tambien estudia la carrera de contabilidad,la socia es una mujer emprendedora que quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita le credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y aceite para la tienda de abarrotes.

La socia esta contenta con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Katherine Marilia has a grocery store business.  She also works at a discotheque and is studying for a career in accounting.  She is a very enterprising woman who wants to get ahead.

Her dream is to expand her grocery store business.

She is requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cooking oil for the grocery store.  She is happy with the loan that was granted, and she pledges to make her payments

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cooking oil for the grocery store.

loans.name: Mirian Jimena

texts.es: La señora Mirian tiene 30 años, estudio hasta el nivel técnico, tiene su esposo con el cual tiene una hija que esta el nivel básico de la escuela fiscal de la zona donde vive que es la zona Sud - Itocta de la ciudad de Cochabamba - Bolivia, es una de las zonas de mayor producción de leche.  La señora actualmente vive en la casa con su madre, la cual se encuentra enferma, además de que su esposo viajo a España para buscar mejores condiciones de trabajo, debido que en nuestro país no ganaba lo suficiente para ahorrar. Actualmente la cliente se está dedicando al sector pecuario, tiene 1 ternera y 3 vacas que están produciendo leche, entrega a la empresa PIL a nombre de la acción de la madre. El crédito que solicita es para compra de una vaca lechera para aumentar la producción de leche, esto es debido a que la cliente piensa formar una granja para que su esposo pueda venirse para colaborarle y así no esté tan lejos de su familia.
texts.en:
Mirian is 30 years old. She completed high school at the technical level. She and her husband have a daughter in primary school in the public school system where she lives in the southern zone of Itocta in the city of Cochabamba, Bolivia, which is one of the major dairy zones.

Currently she lives in her mother’s home, who is sick. Her husband went to Spain in search of better working conditions, because he could not earn enough to save in Bolivia.

Currently she is working with livestock. She has one heifer and three milk producing cows. The company PIL delivers the milk on her behalf.

The loan that she is asking for is to buy a dairy cow in order to increase milk production, as she wants to create a farm so that her husband can come back to work with her and does not have to be so far from the family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Los Triunfadores Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Los Triunfadores” en la ciudad del Cusco y el banco comunal está conformado por mujeres y varones que son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de las socias son por ejemplo; crianza de animales menores, venta de insumos agropecuarios, venta de comida, empleado privado, turismos y otros.

Doris es miembro del banco comunal, ella tiene 46 años y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos. Su actividad económica de la señora Doris es brindar servicios turísticos. Doris lleva a turistas a una comunidad donde hacen el turismo vivencial. Ya son varios  años que se dedica al turismo y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Doris requiere el préstamo para comprar productos como toallas, jaboncillos, cremas dental y otras cosas más. Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.
texts.en:
A group of neighbors and friends formed the Communal Bank “Los Triunfadores” (The Winners) in the city of Cusco. The Communal Bank is made up of men and women who are hard-working and entrepreneurial and who are always looking for opportunities to move forward, and to provide their children with better futures with their daily efforts.

The economic activities of the members include, for example, raising small animals, selling agricultural supplies, food sales, private employment, tourism, and other things.

Doris is a member of the Communal bank. She is 46, and is in a common law marriage within which she has had four children. Doris makes a living offering tourist services. Doris takes tourists to a community where they do experiential tourism. She has several years experience in tourism and it is going very well for her. Doris is requesting a loan at this time to buy products such as towels, soaps, toothpaste and other things. 

The members, in general, appreciate the opportunity offered and are committed to making each of their different payments within the time allotted.

loans.use: to buy products like towels, soaps, toothpaste and other things

loans.name: Tikariy Quillahuata Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “TIKARY QUILLAHUATA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de San sebastian, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de       Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                       
La socia es la Sra. Yuliana ella es casada y tiene 40 años y tiene 5 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de crianza de animales, la socia vende cuyes, la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en el mercado y en diferentes ferias, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 7 años y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes y alimentos para los animales.
El socio que esta pegado a la foto grupal se le tomo despues la foto porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de restaurant, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de crianza de animales y negocio de servicio de taxi.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido
texts.en:
These are the members of the “TIKARY QUILLAHUATA” communal bank, located in the San Sebastian district of the Cusco department and province.

Yuliana is married, is 40 years old, and has five children.  She raises animals and sells Guinea pigs, in the market and at different fairs.  She works from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm and has been doing this for seven years.  Things are going well for her.  Her dream is to have her own establishment from where she can make her sales and she is asking for this loan to buy Guinea pigs and feed.

The photo of the member attached to the group image was taken later because he has to work.

The other members have different businesses, such as grocery store, raising and sale of animas, and taxi service.

She is grateful to those who form part of this dream and promises to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy animals and feed.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La socia Gloria se dedica al negocio de venta de artesania,la socia vende gorros,telares,chompas y guantes,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la artesania,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de artesania.La socia solicita el credito para comprar chompas,gorros,guantes y telares.

La socia esta feliz con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Gloria, makes a living selling handmade crafts.  She sells caps, textiles, sweaters, and gloves.  She works from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m.  She already has been in this business for five years and it's going very well for her.  Her dream is to have a store where she can sell crafts.

She's requesting the loan to buy sweaters, caps, gloves, and textiles.

She's happy about the loan granted and committed to making her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, caps, gloves, and textiles

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shirts and undergarments

loans.name: Sonia Sabina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de agencia de viajes,la socia vende boletos para viajes a diferentes lugares como valle sagrado y machupicchu,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio,en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta pasear con su hijos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar boletos turisticos


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues working in the travel agency business. She sells tickets for trips to different places like the Sacred Valley and Machu Picchu.  She has been in this business for five years.

In her free time she likes to go out with her children. 

She's requesting the loan to buy tickets to tourist attractions.

She's happy about the loan and promises to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy tickets to tourist attractions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy glass

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de verduras,la socia vende tomates,cebollas,apios entre otras verduras,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras.La socia solicita el credito para comprar cebollas,tomates,zanahorias y apios al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower still has her business selling vegetables. She sells tomatoes, onions, celery and other vegetables. She works from 8:00am until 6:00pm.  She has been in this business for eight years now and it is going very well. Her dream is to expand her vegetable-selling business. 

She is applying for a loan to buy onions, tomatoes, carrots and celery at wholesale. She is happy about the loan and promises to make her installment payments.

loans.use: To buy onions, tomatoes, carrots and celery at wholesale.

loans.name: Famy

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al ngeocio de hotel,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta als 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años y le va muyn bien,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de hotel.La socia solicita el credito para comprar sabanas,colchas y frazadas.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Famy continues to work in the hotel business. She works from 8.00am until 6.00pm. Famy has been working in this business for 8 years and things are going well for her. She wants to use this business to get ahead, and her dream is to expand her hotel business. She is asking for a loan to buy sheets, bedspreads and blankets. 

Famy is happy about the loan and she is committed to making her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy sheets, bedspreads and blankets.

loans.name: Sreylon's Group

texts.en:
Sreylon, 26, is married and living with her family in a village of the Kandal Stoeng district of Kandal province, Cambodia. She has two children, both of whom are dependent on her and still too young for school. For the last three years, Sreylon has been working at a garment factory while her husband has also been employed. Together, they can earn about US$2.80 per day from their current work. 
Sreylon has been with VisionFund for one cycle and it is the first cycle with VisionFund for the other member of the group. The previous loan helped Sreylon to better support her family. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy a decent motor vehicle. This loan will enable her family to have a proper motor vehicle for commuting. She hopes to make a better life and to send her children to school.

loans.use: To buy a decent motor vehicle

loans.name: Kimyem

texts.en:
Kimyem is aged 36 and married. She has three children, all of whom are dependent on the family and still in school. Living in a village of the Thmor Koul district, Kimyem is a rice farmer, while her husband works for others for a fee to earn additional income for the family. They have been in this business for 15 years.

This is the fourth loan for Kimyem with VisionFund. She completely repaid the past three loans, which have enabled her family to have enough food. Now she is requesting another loan of 2,000,000 KHR (Cambodian riels). With this loan, she is going to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to gain more income to keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Chamnan's Group

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural village of Battambang province’s Thmor Koul district, Chamnan is aged 37 years and married. She has three children to take care of; all of them are dependents and still in school. To feed the family, she has worked hard as a rice farmer for 15 years, while her husband works for others for a fee to better feed the family. 

Chamnan has been with VisionFund for six loan cycles, while the other group member has been with VisionFund for three cycles. The past loans have helped her gradually improve her living conditions. Now she is leading her group of two to apply for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to pay for labor costs in harvesting rice. Chamnan hopes to make healthy rice to increase her family’s income so as to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To pay for labor costs in harvesting rice.

loans.name: Sary's Group

texts.en:
